form.SN:
v britanski angleščini pišemo tudi
parallelling, parallelled
.

sense.def:
A parallel
je nekaj, kar je zelo podobno nečemu drugemu, vendar obstaja ali se zgodi na drugem kraju ali v drugem času.

seg.quote: It is not difficult to find a living parallel for these prehistoric creatures.
...a book which has no parallel in the English language.

sense.def:
Kadar obstajajo
parallels between two things
, sta si dve stvari v nečem podobni.

seg.quote: There are curious parallels between medicine and law.
His career and attitudes have interesting parallels with Potter's.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
parallels something else
, je enako dobro ali podobno kot nekaj drugega.

Kadar sta črti ali dolga predmeta
parallel
, je med njima enaka razdalja vzdolž vse dolžine.

seg.quote: The boys were marching in two parallel lines.
Vanderhoff Street ran parallel to Broadway.
